explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a method based on relational graph convolutional neural network (R-GCN), which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.neural network: The method uses a relational graph convolutional neural network (R-GCN), which is a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: R-GCN is a deep learning model that generalizes traditional graph convolutional neural networks.
explanations.representation learning: The method extracts correlation characteristics, which involves learning representations of the data.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The method is based on a relational graph convolutional neural network (R-GCN), which is a variant of convolutional neural networks.
explanations.CNN: R-GCN is a variant of convolutional neural networks (CNNs).
explanations.encoder-decoder: The paper mentions building an encoder to identify multiple relations between entities, which is part of an encoder-decoder architecture.
explanations.autoencoder: The encoder mentioned in the paper can be considered part of an autoencoder architecture for feature extraction.
